snippet: A federal judge on Thursday ordered Utah to keep sending money to the local arm of Planned Parenthood amid a lawsuit over the governor’s decision to defund the organization.
abstract: Federal Judge Clark Waddoups orders Utah to continue to fund Planned Parenthood Assn of Utah while lawsuit filed by assn against Gov Gary Herbert for blocking funding proceeds.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Thursday ordered Utah to keep sending money to the local arm of Planned Parenthood amid a lawsuit over the governor’s decision to defund the organization.

headline.print_headline: Utah: Planned Parenthood Funds to Continue as Court Considers Suit
headline.main: Utah: Planned Parenthood Funds to Continue as Court Considers Suit
